Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
Name: BIN()
Description:
Returns a string representation of the binary value of
          N, where
          N is a longlong
          (BIGINT) number. This is
          equivalent to
          CONV(N,10,2).
          Returns NULL if
          N is NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT BIN(12);
        -> '1100'
